name: Graduate Admission Prediction
description: Dataset with admission-related factors for graduate applicants, including test scores, GPA, and chance of admission.

columns.name: GRE Score
columns.description: Graduate Record Examination score of the applicant.

columns.name: TOEFL Score
columns.description: Test of English as a Foreign Language score of the applicant.

columns.name: SOP
columns.description: Strength of the applicants Statement of Purpose (scale 1-5).

columns.name: LOR
columns.description: Strength of the applicants Letters of Recommendation (scale 1-5).

columns.name: CGPA
columns.description: Cumulative Grade Point Average of the applicant on a 10-point scale.

columns.name: Research
columns.description: Indicates whether the applicant has research experience (0 = No, 1 = Yes).

columns.name: Chance of Admit
columns.description: Probability of admission, expressed as a decimal between 0 and 1.
